title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - C. 70 (Alcohol,Drugs 7)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 70 (Alcoholism, Drug Abuse 7):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Anderson - How to Change Your Drinking; a Harm Reduction Guide to Alcohol, 2e (2010)

-  Aromin - 100 Questions & Answers about Your Child's Substance Abuse (2012)

-  Berglund et al (Eds.) - Treating Alcohol and Drug Abuse; an Evidence Based Review (2003)

-  Chapman - Liquor, Lust and the Law; the Story of Vancouver's Legendary Penthouse Night Club (2012)

-  Cheever - Drinking in America; Our Secret History (2015)

-  Clarkson - Cocaine Confidential; the True Stories Behind the World's Most Notorious Narcotic (2014)

-  Cleveland (Ed.) - Substance Abuse Recovery in College; Community Supported Abstinence (2010)

-  Cooper - Run, Swim, Throw, Cheat; the Science behind Drugs in Sport (2012)

-  Davenport-Hines - The Pursuit of Oblivion; a Social History of Drugs (2001)

-  Dormandy - Opium; Reality's Dark Dream (2012)

-  Emmett & Nice - What You Need to Know About Cannabis; Understanding the Facts (2009)

-  Gossop - Living with Drugs, 7e (2013)

-  Grace - This Naked Mind; Control Alcohol, Find Freedom, Discover Happiness, & Change Your Life (2015)

-  Gray - Drug Crazy; How We Got into This Mess and How We Can Get Out (2000)

-  Hepola - Blackout; Remembering the Things I Drank to Forget (2015)

-  Itzkoff - Cocaine's Son; a Memoir (2011)

-  Jayne et al - Alcohol, Drinking, Drunkenness; (Dis)Orderly Spaces (2011)

-  Johnson - The Federal Government and the Liquor Traffic (1911)

-  Karch & Drummer - Pathology of Drug Abuse, 5e (2016)

-  Kaye et al (Eds.) - Substance Abuse; Inpatient and Outpatient Management for Every Clinician (2015)

-  Koren - Alcohol and Society (1916)

-  Levounis & Herron (Eds.) - The Addiction Casebook (2014)

-  Lopes - Global Brands; The Evolution of Multinationals in Alcoholic Beverages (2007)

-  Martin - Alcohol, Sex and Gender in Late Medieval and Early Europe (2001)

-  McCoy - The Emperor of Wine (2005)

-  Mendelson - From Demon to Darling; a Legal History of Wine in America (2009)

-  Milam & Ketcham - Under the Influence; a Guide to the Myths and Realities of Alcoholism (1981)

-  Ormsby - Silk Road; the Shocking True Story of the World's Most Notorious Online Drug Market (2014)

-  Pond & Palmer - Wasted; an Alcoholic Therapist's Fight for Recovery in a Tragically Flawed Treatment System (2016)

-  Rotskoff  - Love on the Rocks; Men, Women, and Alcohol in Postâ€“World War II America (2002)

-  Seddon - A History of Drugs; Drugs and Freedom in the Liberal Age (2010)

-  Svanberg et al (Eds.) - Alcohol and the Adult Brain (2015)

-  UNODC - World Drug Report (2014)

-  Warburton & Callfas - Junior Drug Awareness; Amphetamines and Other Stimulants (2008)

-  Wodarski & Curtis (Eds.) - E-Therapy for Substance Abuse and Co-Morbidity (2015)
